entry.title: JET 3K114 - 3-1/4 X (3/8-1/2) Knot Twisted Wire Wheel Unthreaded 550310
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Full Cable Twist Knot Wheels
Price: 26.26

[shortdesc]

3-1/4 x (3/8-1/2) Knot Twisted Wire Wheel - Unthreaded

  • These high performance brushes are made from top quality USA high carbon steel wire for maximum performance and life
  • Full cable twist brushes are made with tightly wound, low flex tufts which offer a very aggressive high impact brushing action with best control at the surface contact area
  • The best brush for weld cleaning, weld spatter and scale removal, cleaning, deburring and flash removal where surface finish is a low priority
  • Also used in pipe joining for cleaning scale and spatter following welding
  • Available in high quality carbon steel
  • 6" and 8" brushes come with round center holes for use on end grinders and bench grinders - 3-1/4" brush is popular in the automotive trades for use on die grinders
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Diameter 3-1/4 Inch
    Product Type Full Cable Twist Knot Wheels
    Size 7/8 Inch - 14 NF

    Extra Product Information

  • These high performance brushes are made from top quality USA high carbon steel wire for maximum performance and life

    • Product Information

  • Thread Size : 3/8 Inch-1/2
  • Face Width : 1/2 Inch
  • Wire Diameter : .014 Inch
  • Max
  • Speed : 25,000 RPM
  • Pkg Qty : 1
    		•

entry.title: JET 4SB120-T - 4 X 1/4 X 5/8-11 Nc Stringer Bead Brush 553432
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Stringer Bead Brushes
Price: 30.25

[shortdesc]

4 x 1/4 x 5/8-11 NC Stringer Bead Brush

  • These high performance brushes are made from top quality USA high carbon steel wire for optimum life and performance
  • They are specifically designed for root and hot pass weld cleaning in pipe joining applications
  • Stringer bead brushes can also be used wherever a controlled, aggressive brushing action is required on confined surface contact areas
  • The superior balance and high knot count of our brush ensures smooth but aggressive brushing action for fast material removal
    • [/shortdesc]

entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Conical Bevel Brushes
Price: 30.90

[shortdesc]

4-1/2 x 5/8-11 NC Knot Twisted Conical Brush

  • High speed knotted conical brushes are ideal for heavy clean-up of weld spatter, slag, rust paint and scale in hard-to-reach areas
